device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <specific> <!-- Autoprovisioned values will be written on boot.
To use autoprovisioning, create a copy of this file with the desired settings and name this file with the mac address of the device to configure (for example: 0020f7350058.xml). Put this file into your hosted directory and manually set the hosting server address.
Alternately you can set your dhcp server to provide the autoprovisioning server address in OPTION 43, 72, 150, or 66.
On boot the device will download its autoprovisioning file and configure itself with those settings.
Though every setting that can be changed via autoprovisioning is shown below, it isn't necessary to set every value.
See the documentation for other ways you can organize your autoprovisioning files. -->
<MiscSettings> {IF ua=CyberData SIP Call Button} <device_name>SIP Call Button</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Indoor Intercom} <device_name>Indoor Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Outdoor Keypad Intercom} <device_name>Outdoor Keypad Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Office Ringer} <device_name>Office Ringer</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Strobe} <device_name>SIP Strobe</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData SIP Paging Adapter} <device_name>SIP Paging Adapter</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Paging Server} <device_name>Paging Server</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Outdoor Intercom} <device_name>Outdoor Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Indoor Keypad Intercom} <device_name>Indoor Keypad Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Emergency Intercom} <device_name>Emergency Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Paging Amplifier} <device_name>Paging Amplifier</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Round Speaker} <device_name>SIP Speaker</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Square Speaker} <device_name>SIP Speaker</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Zone Controller} <device_name>Zone Controller</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData RGB Strobe} <device_name>RGB Strobe</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Video Intercom} <device_name>Video Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData Video Keypad Intercom} <device_name>Video Keypad Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData RFID Intercom} <device_name>RFID Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF} {IF ua=CyberData RFID Video Intercom} <device_name>RFID Video Intercom</device_name> {ENDIF}
<!-- <autoprov>common.xml</autoprov>--> <!-- <autoprov>sip_reg[macaddress].xml</autoprov>--> <!-- <autoprov>audio[macaddress]</autoprov>--> <!-- <autoprov>device[macaddress].xml</autoprov>--> </MiscSettings>
<AutoprovSettings> <autoprov_enabled>1</autoprov_enabled> <autoprov_server>%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%</autoprov_server> <autoprov_filename>%%mac_address%%.xml</autoprov_filename> <autoprov_username></autoprov_username> <autoprov_password></autoprov_password> <autoprov_use_tftp>0</autoprov_use_tftp> <autoprov_timeout>0</autoprov_timeout> <autoprov_at_time></autoprov_at_time> <autoprov_when_idle>0</autoprov_when_idle> </AutoprovSettings>
<NetworkSettings> <use_dhcp>1</use_dhcp> <!-- <use_dhcp>0</use_dhcp> --> <ip_addr>10.10.10.10</ip_addr> <subnet_mask>255.0.0.0</subnet_mask> <gw_addr>10.0.0.1</gw_addr> <dns1_addr>10.0.0.1</dns1_addr> <dns2_addr>10.0.0.1</dns2_addr> <dhcp_timeout>60</dhcp_timeout> <vlan_id>0</vlan_id> <vlan_priority>0</vlan_priority> </NetworkSettings>
<SIPSettings> <sip_enable>1</sip_enable> <local_sip_port>5060</local_sip_port> <sip_proxy></sip_proxy> <sip_proxy_port>0</sip_proxy_port> <sip_register>1</sip_register> <keepalive>10000</keepalive> <disable_rport_discovery>No</disable_rport_discovery> </SIPSettings>
<DialoutSettings> <index0>
{IF blf1} <extension>%%blf1%%</extension> <extensionid>%%extension_number%%</extensionid> {ELSE} <extension></extension> <extensionid></extensionid> {ENDIF}
</index0> </DialoutSettings>
<!-- SIPServerSettings --> <!-- index0 is the primary sip server --> <!-- index1 is the backup sip server 1 --> <!-- index2 is the backup sip server 2 --> <!-- index3 is the nightringer -->
<SIPServerSettings> <index0> <server>%%pbx_ip%%</server> <port>%%param::sipport%%</port> <userid>%%extension_number%%</userid> <authid>%%extension_auth_id%%</authid> <password>%%extension_auth_pw%%</password> <registration_timeout>120</registration_timeout> </index0> </SIPServerSettings>
<ClockSettings> <ntp_enabled>1</ntp_enabled> <ntp_server>%%param::time_ntp_server%%</ntp_server> <timezone>%%param::time_timezone_cyberdata%%</timezone> </ClockSettings>
<DeviceSettings> <admin_name>admin</admin_name> <admin_password>%%DESKPHONE_PASSWORD%%</admin_password> </DeviceSettings>
{IF ua=CyberData Outdoor Keypad Intercom} <ButtonSettings>
<!-- ButtonSettings-->
<!-- keypad_mode is a number between 0-4 where: --> <!-- 0 = Telephone --> <!-- 1 = Speed Dial --> <!-- 2 = unused --> <!-- 3 = Security --> <!-- 4 = Cell Phone -->
<PlayButtonTone>Yes</PlayButtonTone> <!-- <keypad_mode>0</keypad_mode> --> <!-- <keypad_mode>1</keypad_mode> -->
<keypad_mode>3</keypad_mode>
<!-- <keypad_mode>4</keypad_mode> --> </ButtonSettings> {ENDIF}
{IF ua=CyberData Indoor Keypad Intercom} <ButtonSettings>
<!-- ButtonSettings-->
<!-- keypad_mode is a number between 0-4 where: --> <!-- 0 = Telephone --> <!-- 1 = Speed Dial --> <!-- 2 = unused --> <!-- 3 = Security --> <!-- 4 = Cell Phone -->
<PlayButtonTone>Yes</PlayButtonTone> <!-- <keypad_mode>0</keypad_mode> --> <!-- <keypad_mode>1</keypad_mode> -->
<keypad_mode>3</keypad_mode>
<!-- <keypad_mode>4</keypad_mode> --> </ButtonSettings> {ENDIF}
{IF ua=CyberData Video Keypad Intercom} <ButtonSettings>
<!-- ButtonSettings-->
<!-- keypad_mode is a number between 0-4 where: --> <!-- 0 = Telephone --> <!-- 1 = Speed Dial --> <!-- 2 = unused --> <!-- 3 = Security --> <!-- 4 = Cell Phone -->
<PlayButtonTone>Yes</PlayButtonTone> <!-- <keypad_mode>0</keypad_mode> --> <!-- <keypad_mode>1</keypad_mode> -->
<keypad_mode>3</keypad_mode>
<!-- <keypad_mode>4</keypad_mode> --> </ButtonSettings> {ENDIF}
</specific>
